metadata.description:
I bet most of you have heard about Medellín because of Pablo Escobar or some Narcos series... Today I bring you a song with which I intend to show you a little more about our culture. Our idiosyncrasy is joy, and therefore life... despite the fact that we went through dark moments as a society, we have known how to get up and get ahead… No more stigmas ¡LET'S IMPACT CULTURE WITH COLLECTABLE MUSIC!

Christmas in Medellin and Colombia hits different, there are many traditions around this time of the year, and here, December lasts from November to January. There are parties everywhere and the atmosphere is pure euphoria. Christmas is lived as a big party.

This song tells  what it's like to live a Christmas in Medellin, although to really get closer to what it is to live this experience, you have to come to Colombia and live it firsthand.

Here you can see what each part of the lyrics means, culturally... with videos and real images! you will feel like in Medellín: 

https://mirror.xyz/0x0A032Cd1433DD23616B94F925CB6c86db6b7f073/y-WufDB8xPkPrXcTfXDJPabiXztyTPKLfUNfa7fnyTg

Lyrics

Block party,
rodolfo sounds on the radio
here the thirst is cured with Guaro,
There are many,
who don´t  pay and drink,
up, down, if it drips it's double
lemon with rum,
they played reggaeton...
the bad is forgotten,
There is a party in the city.

We got plans in the neighborhood,
forgetting the pain is the intention,
loudspeakers in each corner,
and the neighbor who is the sensation.
a Vallenato,
closely
the gang is up,
street custard,
blow hard,
the fire went out.
this perreo got very hot
 everything is lit,
the mountains made mangers,
every day is friday
coffee with aguardiente,
sancocho the next day,
let december feel…
And this reggaeton lights up the street for you to see
from the country with the most holidays on planet earth 
 crowned, we give it to the floor,
And if you are by Sabaneta I'll get to you on horseback.

Chorus

tell me how is the situation
 Where do I get you?
that I already have the estren.
 I already cleaned everything with incense,
and next year
I'm going to stop drinking.
watch as you light the candles,
and there is nothing virgin about you.
yeah,
on the 31st the vacilón got started
everybody put away your guns
there's a celebration...
Sweet bath, for good energy.
yellow panties, grandmother's omens.

this perreo got very hot
 everything is lit,
the mountains made mangers,
every day is friday
coffee with aguardiente,
sancocho the next day,
let december feel…
And this reggaeton lights up the street for you to see
from the country with the most holidays on planet earth 
 crowned, we give it to the floor,
And if you are by Sabaneta I'll get to you on horseback.


Chorus

lyrics.text:
Fiesta en el barrio,
Rodolfo suena en la radio
aquí la seca se cura a punta de guaro,
hay varios,
que no pagan y tomaron,
pa arriba, pa abajo,  si gotea es doble,
ououo
limoncito con ron,
ouou,
le pusieron reggaeton...
lo malo se olvida, 
Hay fiesta en la ciudad. 

Parche en el barrio,
olvidar la pena es la intención,
bafles en cada esquina,
y la vecina que es la sensación.
un Vallenato,
pegaito,
el combo se activó,
natillada en la calle,
sople duro,
el fuego se apagó. 
 este perreo  se puso bien caliente
 to´ está alumbrado,
las montañas hechas pesebres,
todos los días son viernes,
café con aguardiente, 
sancocho al día siguiente,
que se sienta diciembre.
Y este reggaeton enciende la calle pa que tu veas,
desde el pais con mas festivo´ en el planeta tierra, 
 coronaos, le damos hasta abajo,
y si te esta por Sabaneta le llego a caballo.

CORO

Dime cómo fue la vuelta,
 a dónde le llego, 
que  ya tengo el estren.
 ya limpié to´ con incienso,
y el próximo año,
voy a dejar de beber. 
vela como prende las velitas,
y no tiene nada de virgencita. 
yeah,
el 31 se armo el vacilón,
todo el mundo guarde las pistolas,
que hay celebración...
baño dulce, para las buenas energías. 
calzones amarillo´, agueros de abuelita.

metadata.name: Christmas In Medellín #1
metadata.title: Christmas In Medellín
